DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop tumor cell divide stop grow die . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness chemotherapy pyrazoloacridine treat patient stage IIIB stage IV non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Pyrazoloacridine Treating Patients With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate antitumor activity pyrazoloacridine ( PZA ) administer 3-hour infusion patient advance non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . II . Determine qualitative quantitative toxicity PZA administer schedule . III . Determine response survival duration NSCLC patient treat PZA . OUTLINE : Single-Agent Chemotherapy . Pyrazoloacridine , PZA , NSC-366140 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : If 2 3 response observe first 18 evaluable patient , 12 additional patient enter . Accrual expect take 5-12 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm non small cell lung cancer ineligible high priority protocol Sputum cytology acceptable Stage IIIB/IV Must measurable evaluable disease Lesion outside prior radiotherapy field Cytologypositive pleural effusion ascites neither measurable evaluable No brain metastases CT PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : Over 18 Performance status : Zubrod 02 Life expectancy : At least 12 week Hematopoietic : Absolute granulocyte count great 2,000/mm3 Platelet count great 100,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin le 2.0 mg/dL Renal : Creatinine le 1.5 mg/dL Other : No pregnant nursing woman Negative pregnancy test require fertile woman Effective contraception require fertile patient Blood/body fluid analysis within 7 day prior registration Imaging/exams tumor measurement within 28 day prior registration PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : One prior adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy allow Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : At least 4 week since radiotherapy recover AND Progressive disease outside radiation port Surgery : Recovered prior surgery
DOC.keyword: stage IIIB non-small cell lung cancer
stage IV non-small cell lung cancer
